fields.name: Beyond Pilates
fields.description: Spacedye Caught in the Midi High Waisted Leggins - Blue
fields.details: Cut from sumptuously soft performance fabric, Beyond Pilates's blue Spacedye Caught In The Midi High Waisted Leggings are iconic. Enjoy high-performance wear, UV protection and a midi length.

fields.name: Lilybod Pilates
fields.details: Show off your moves in the Dynamic Full Length Legging, designed to embrace freedom of movement with four-way stretch and a compressive design that sculpts and supports, enhanced by strategic panel seams for a flattering fit. Elevate your outfit with a high waist, double waistband, and chic mesh panelling adorned with the iconic Lilybod signature logo print at the back waist.

fields.name: Lilybod
fields.details: Discover your potential with the Limitless Leggings, crafted with 4-way stretch and medium support. The high-waisted design and wide waistband deliver a secure and flattering fit, empowering you to tackle any fitness challenge. Stay cool no matter the activity with the moisture-wicking fabric.

fields.name: Ola Yoga
fields.details: Meet your most essential bra. The Wellness Bra is an instant classic, with a ribbed body and easy-to-wear silhouette that’s perfect solo or styled. Cut from ribbed performance jersey fabric, this medium-support bra has a scoop neckline, 4-way stretch and is uniquely fit to flatter every size.

fields.name: Lilybod Yoga
fields.details: Make early mornings easier with Lilybod collection's grey Yoga set. This versatile one piece is crafted from recycled, sweat-wicking fabric that sculpts the frame, supports the bust and has a flattering waist seam.

fields.name: Helluka
fields.details: Designed by yoga teachers, Helluka's eKO Lite Yoga Mat 4mm in Acai Midnight is incredibly durable and comfortable. Plus, it offers the perfect balance of flow and drag, is sustainable, hygienic and engineered from natural rubber.
fields.fabric_care: 99% Latex-free. Not recommended for those with Latex sensitivities.

fields.name: Bodymax Dumbbells
fields.details: The BodyMax Neoprene Studio Dumbbells enhance every rep and bring versatility to your workout routine. With a durable neoprene layer, hexagonal shaping, and a comfortable grip, the BodyMax Neoprene Studio Dumbbells are ideal for strength training, fitness exercises, or rehabilitation.

fields.name: Pilates Ball
fields.details: Whether you're training at home or in the gym, this Pilates Ball will make the perfect workout partner. Ideal for training, toning and strengthening your core muscles, you can advance to using weights to train other areas of your body, including your chest, shoulders and arms. This gym ball is great for improving your balance and co-ordination.

fields.name: Fit Running
fields.details: Get the best of both worlds with the Adizero Essentials Running Jacket, where lightweight design meets uncompromising performance. The full zip and stand-up collar keep the cold out, while ventilated underarm inserts keep you cool when you need it. With front zip pockets and a durable water-repellent (DWR) coating, it's ideal for any adventure, big or small!
fields.fabric_care: 100% recycled polyester plain weave. Machine wash cold. Do not use fabric softener. Wash inside out. Use mild detergent only. Wash with fasteners closed. Wash with similar colours. Do not dry clean. Do not bleach. Do not iron.

fields.name: Nike
fields.description: Epic Fast Pocket Running Leggings - Black
fields.details: Get ready to dominate your workout in style with the Nike Epic Fast Mid-Rise Pocket Running Leggings. Featuring curved back seams give the perfect silhouette. Breathable mesh panels and a reflective element for visibility during low light conditions, you'll shine no matter the weather.
fields.fabric_care: Body: 80% polyester/20% spandex. Panels: 92% polyester/8% spandex. Mesh: 81% polyester/19% spandex. Gusset lining: 100% polyester. Machine wash

fields.name: On Runinng
fields.details: The Running Shorts are light on weight but big on impact, thanks to a dual-layer design, superior technical fabrication and adjustable waist. Enjoy 4-way stretch, a breathable feel and sweat-wicking experience.
fields.fabric_care: Outer brief: 87% polyamide, 13% elastane. Inner brief: 65% recycled polyamide, 35% elastane. Machine wash 30°C gentle. Iron on low. Do not dry clean, tumble dry or bleach.

fields.name: GO
fields.details: Step into the future of running with the Puma Velocity NITRO 3. Engineered for speed and comfort, these shoes boast advanced NITRO technology for unmatched responsiveness and cushioning in a lightweight build. It's not just footwear, it's a revolution.
fields.fabric_care: Lining: Textile; Outsole: Rubber; Upper: Textile; Sockliner: Textile

fields.name: Just RUN
fields.details: The ninth iteration of the award-winning Clifton franchise has launched, lighter and more cushioned than ever before. Eliminating weight while adding 3mm in stack height, the new Clifton 9 delivers a revitalized underfoot experience with a responsive new foam and improved outsole design.
fields.fabric_care: Breathable mesh upper, EVA foam, High-abrasion rubber

fields.name: Just RUN
fields.details: The Saucony Axon 3 in Orchid/Cinder helps you savor every stride. Designed for more feel-good miles and incredibly plush, it comes stacked with a bed of PWRRUN foam cushioning. All in all, it's the complete running package.
fields.fabric_care: Breathable mesh upper; PWRRUN foam midsole, EVA in the midsole uses 36% bio-based foam

fields.name: On Running
fields.details: The On Running Lightweight Cap is a featherlight, fast-drying running hat for hard-working protection whatever weather you run in. Laser-cut ventilation helps you keep a cool head. Made with tear proof woven fabrics, ultra-soft sweatbands, clip-pull sizing and finished with hand-detailing, this cap is in a field of its own.

fields.name: Just Run
fields.details: Beanies are undefeated fashion statements. And you're feeling a little extra outspoken today. Or maybe it's just cold out. Either way this adidas Wide Cuff Beanie has the warmth and wonder you need to complete your look.
fields.fabric_care: 53% recycled polyester, 47% polyacrylics plain knit.Hand wash.

fields.name: Just Run
fields.description: Essential Headband and Glove Set - Black/Silver
fields.details: The Just Run Essential Headband and Glove Set is made with lightweight, sweat-wicking fleece that helps keeps you warm and dry while you run. The back of the headband has a breathable design to release heat as your run heats up. The gloves feature a silicone grip that makes it touchscreen compatible.
fields.fabric_care: Glove: Palm: 71% polyester/12% spandex/10% nylon/7% polyurethane (PU foam). Back: 86% polyester/14% spandex. Other: 87% polyester/13% spandex .Headband: 70% polyester/18% nylon/12% spandex. Hand wash

fields.name: Just Run
fields.details: The Runner’s Bottle is a perfect, lightweight, handheld bottle to keep you hydrated during your run.

fields.name: Just Run
fields.details: The Ribble II Hydration Belt makes carrying fluids for both runners, and walkers, easy and comfortable. A 650ml water bottle is included. It has a large zipped pocket to store valuables, energy gels and other essentials. The water bottle holster is angled to make it easy to access with an additional pocket.
